variant: Colour: Vintage Brown, Style Name: Leather strap

reviewDescription: Its been a month since am using the product and I would say am totally satisfied with what is offered at the price range. Being a fitbit band user before, from accuracy point its not up to the mark but still its quite reliable.Pros and cons as per per my usageDesign: Design looks premium and with leather belt looks quite a premium.Features: Am not a fan of too many features and rather quality and reliability of the feature which is being offered. Considering that it has almost all the basic features and they are quite reliable.Battery life: Am quite amazed at the battery life. With moderate usage keeping phone call off keeping only notifications on, am getting around a week's battery back up which is impressive.Cons:Accuracy: Being a fitbit owned user, I feel accuracy of the reading is not that accurate but would consider just ok with most the user(for atletics where reading should be accurate, woyld not recomment)Heart Rate: There is no continious HR monitor, it can be kept manual or automatic every five 5 mins which is fine but a continuous reading qould be more beneficial. Also app doesnt calculate resting heart rate which i was been habitual with.Customization: It has less customization, as in you cannot customize the menu screen or widget ordering and even app design coupd have been better.

reviewTitle: Halo plus is really plus features
reviewDescription: Review: Noise Halo Plus Elite Edition SmartwatchThe Noise Halo Plus Elite Edition is a feature-packed smartwatch designed for tech-savvy individuals looking for style, performance, and advanced functionality. Here's an in-depth review:Design & BuildThe Halo Plus Elite Edition boasts a premium metallic finish with a sleek and minimalist design. The AMOLED display offers vibrant colors and sharp clarity, making it easy to read in various lighting conditions. Its lightweight build and customizable straps make it comfortable for extended wear.PerformancePowered by a responsive processor, the watch ensures smooth navigation through apps and features. With Bluetooth 5.3, the connectivity is reliable and quick, ensuring you never miss a notification. The battery life impresses with a runtime of up to 7 days under normal usage, even with continuous monitoring features active.Fitness & Health FeaturesThis smartwatch shines in health tracking with advanced features like:Heart rate and SpO2 monitoring for real-time updates.Sleep tracking with detailed insights into sleep cycles.Over 100 sports modes, making it suitable for fitness enthusiasts.The Halo Plus Elite also provides personalized fitness analytics to help you achieve your goals.Smart FeaturesBluetooth calling with a built-in speaker and microphone ensures hassle-free conversations.AI voice assistant integration allows you to manage tasks hands-free.You can control music, set reminders, and even get weather updates directly on your wrist.ProsStylish, premium design.Crisp AMOLED display.Excellent fitness tracking with 100+ sports modes.Long battery life.Seamless Bluetooth calling.ConsNo built-in GPS, relying on the smartphone for location tracking.Limited app ecosystem compared to premium brands.VerdictThe Noise Halo Plus Elite Edition is an excellent choice for those seeking an affordable yet premium smartwatch. Its blend of health features, stylish design, and smart functionalities make it a value-for-money device for both fitness enthusiasts and everyday users.Rating: ★★★★☆ (4.5/5)

reviewDescription: The Noise Halo Plus Elite Smartwatch is a true marvel of technology that has left me impressed beyond measure. As an avid tech enthusiast and fitness aficionado, I've had the pleasure of testing numerous smartwatches, but none have come close to the experience offered by the Halo Plus Elite.Design & Build Quality:The first thing that caught my eye was the sleek and stylish design of the Halo Plus Elite. The premium build quality and attention to detail are evident in every aspect of the smartwatch. The stainless steel case, paired with a comfortable silicone strap, ensures a perfect fit for extended wear. Its 1.4-inch AMOLED display is vivid, with vibrant colors and excellent visibility even under direct sunlight.Features & Performance:The Noise Halo Plus Elite excels in its features and performance. The range of functionalities provided is astounding. From the standard fitness tracking features like heart rate monitoring, step counting, and sleep tracking to the more advanced functions like SpO2 monitoring and stress tracking, this smartwatch covers it all. It effortlessly syncs with the accompanying mobile app, which is user-friendly and intuitive.The built-in GPS is a valuable addition, providing accurate tracking during outdoor workouts and runs. Moreover, the watch boasts an IP68 water and dust resistance rating, making it suitable for all-weather use and swim tracking.Battery Life:One of the standout features of the Halo Plus Elite is its impressive battery life. With typical usage, it easily lasts around 5 to 7 days, depending on the number of notifications and workouts. This is a significant improvement over many other smartwatches on the market, reducing the need for frequent charging and enhancing its overall usability.Smart Functions:The Noise Halo Plus Elite goes beyond the conventional fitness tracking and smartwatch features. It allows you to access and reply to notifications, control music playback, and even set reminders directly from your wrist. The integration with various apps and platforms is seamless, enhancing the overall user experience.Price:While the Halo Plus Elite sits at a higher price point compared to some budget smartwatches, the wealth of features and top-notch performance it offers justifies the investment. For those looking for a premium smartwatch experience without breaking the bank, the Halo Plus Elite is a worthy option.Conclusion:In conclusion, the Noise Halo Plus Elite Smartwatch is an exceptional device that sets new standards in the smartwatch industry. Its elegant design, comprehensive fitness tracking capabilities, long-lasting battery life, and seamless smart functions make it a true game-changer. Whether you're a fitness enthusiast or a tech-savvy individual, this smartwatch will undoubtedly elevate your lifestyle and keep you connected while helping you stay on top of your health and fitness goals. I wholeheartedly recommend the Noise Halo Plus Elite to anyone seeking a top-tier smartwatch experience.

reviewDescription: The **Noise Halo Smartwatch** is an absolute game-changer! Its sleek and modern design instantly catches the eye, making it a stylish accessory for any occasion. The AMOLED display is bright, vibrant, and incredibly responsive, offering an excellent user experience.The health and fitness tracking features are top-notch, with accurate heart rate monitoring, SpO2 measurement, and sleep tracking. I particularly love the wide range of sports modes, which cater to all types of activities. The battery life is impressive, lasting several days on a single charge, even with continuous usage.What sets the Noise Halo apart is its seamless connectivity. Notifications, calls, and music control work flawlessly, and the companion app is intuitive and user-friendly. It's packed with features but remains lightweight and comfortable to wear all day.Overall, the Noise Halo smartwatch offers premium features at an affordable price point. Whether you're a fitness enthusiast or someone looking for a stylish smartwatch with advanced functionality, this is a fantastic choice. Highly recommended!

reviewTitle: Mixed Experience, But Happy at the End with a Replacement
reviewDescription: At first, this smartwatch Noise Halo Elite impressed me with sleek designs and advanced features, but I had to face many problems. Sometimes sleep was not tracked properly and was not consistent, and at some instances, the heart rate was detected incorrectly. In addition, connectivity drop-offs with my phone kept happening very frequently. Its problems persisted even after restarting it several times, and at times, the touch response was quite lagging.After contacting the customer service department, they sent me a replacement. All issues that the previous ones had were solved by this new one. It is now perfectly tracking my health, especially my sleep patterns. The customer service is fast, and the new one seems to be stable. I am content with this watch and the seriousness with which Noise is willing to solve issues.

     (After 30 days of use, they remove the month and year records of step. You have to pay 99 / year to access this again - Also, you cannot make your own watchface unless you subscribe to "Gold"). I have not even explored how many other features they have removed and are charging for it.This watch fullfilled all my requirements, however there are some cons. Used this smart watch for 6 days and here's my view.Pros:1. Battery life survived for 6 days with continuous usage2. Amoled screen display is good (AOD feature helps in showing time on locked screen too)3. Notification from your gmail calendar4. Heath - heart rate, steps, breathing exercise, SPO2, all good!5. Response time of the touch screen is good.6. Find my device7. Torch8. Call connect is good, you can take calls, or just have a feature for call notification or reject calls.Cons1. The speaker of the watch is not that great, you have to keep the watch close to your ears to listen to call2. The steps count are not accurate (you just move your hands and it counts)3. The Watchface are limited to 4 on watch (out of which 3 are noisefit default- so you get only one); which also takes quite a lot of time to load from the phone. (not very happy)4. If you are controlling the music, the music application is not easily accessible. you have to go to the location where the application is on the phone.5. The watch is NOT waterproof - do not put it in water. the watch can take some few drizzle drops of rain... but ensure it wiped (some buttons are lose from where water can go in)6. The health fitness records could have been a bit better in the software application on phone.

reviewDescription: The NoiseFit Halo smartwatch offers a compelling blend of premium aesthetics and practical functionality at an affordable price point.Design and DisplayThe Halo features a robust metallic build, providing a premium look uncommon in its price range. It comes with a 1.43-inch AMOLED circular display boasting a 466x466 pixel resolution. The screen is vibrant and bright, ensuring comfortable outdoor usage. Additionally, it supports gestures like Tap to Wake and Hold with Palm to turn off the screen.Performance and FeaturesEquipped with health monitoring tools such as a heart rate monitor, SpO2 sensor, sleep tracker, and step tracker, the Halo ensures seamless performance without noticeable lags. It supports Bluetooth calling with the Tru Sync feature, allowing quick pairing and stable connectivity. The device offers over 100 watch faces through the NoiseFit app, enabling extensive customization.Battery LifeNoise claims a 7-day battery life without extensive Bluetooth calling. However, with Bluetooth calling active for several hours daily, users might experience a reduction in battery longevity.ConclusionThe NoiseFit Halo stands out for its premium design and comprehensive features at a budget-friendly price of ₹3,999. It's an excellent choice for those seeking a stylish and functional smartwatch without a premium price tag.For a more in-depth look at the NoiseFit Halo, you might find this video review helpful:
